description:
This course fulfils one of the upper division requirements for the Life Science Major.

This course aims to be an advanced research seminar examining the latest findings in Molecular, Cellular and Developmental Biology. The focus will be on analysis of primary literature. Students will work on scientific writing and presentation.
title: Adv Topics Molecular, Cell & Developmental Bio: Stem Cells
prerequisite: YSC2233 Genetics or YSC3214 Biochemistry or YSC3233 Molecular Cell Biology or YSC3238 Developmental Biology or with the permission of the instructor.
